text.*:
Mbalmayo National Forestry School, Mbalmayo, Cameroon

This is a list of secondary, tertiary and technical schools, and practical training institutes around the world offering one- or two-year forestry technician and related degrees, diplomas or certificates, grouped by continent and country.[1]

(For higher educational institutions offering bachelor's, master's or doctoral degrees in forestry and related fields see: List of forestry universities and colleges.)

This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.

Africa[edit]

Cameroon[edit]

  • École pour la Formation de Spécialistes de la Faune - Garoua
  • Mbalmayo National Forestry School, Mbalmayo[2]

Guinea[edit]

  • National School for Technicians of the National Forestry Commission (ENATEF)

Ivory Coast[edit]

  • School of Fauna and Protected Areas of Bouaflé
  • Banco Forestry School

Kenya[edit]

  • Kenya Forestry College, Londiani

Malawi[edit]

  • Malawi College of Forestry and Wildlife, Dedza

Mali[edit]

  • Forestry Practical Training Centre of Tabakoro (CFPF)

Mauritania[edit]

  • National School for Training and Rural Extension (Kaédi)

Niger[edit]

  • Practical Institute of Rural Development (IPDR)

Senegal[edit]

  • Center of Forest Recycling, Thies
  • National Center for the Formation of Water and Forest Technicians, Hunting, and National Parks (CNETEFCPN)
  • National School of Rural Frameworks (ENCR)

Tanzania[edit]

  • Forest Training Institute, Olmotonyi

Tunisia[edit]

  • Sylvo-Pastoral Institute of Tabarka, University of Jendouba

Uganda[edit]

  • Nyabyeya Forestry College

Zambia[edit]

  • Zambia Forestry College

Zimbabwe[edit]

  • Forest Industries Training Centre (FITC)

Americas[edit]

Bolivia[edit]

  • Technical School of Forestry, Universidad Mayor de San Simón

Brazil[edit]

  • President Costa e Silva State Forestry School

Canada[edit]

  • Forest Technology Program, Maritime College of Forest Technology, New Brunswick[3]
  • Forest Technology Program, Northern Alberta Institute of Technology (NAIT)
  • Forestry Resources Technology Programme, Vancouver Island University, British Columbia

Costa Rica[edit]

  • La Fundación Escuela de Reforestación de Costa Rica (FERCO)

Ecuador[edit]

  • School of Agroforestry, Escuela Superior Politécnica de Chimborazo

Guatemala[edit]

  • Escuela Nacional Central de Agricultura (ENCAA)

Mexico[4][edit]

  • Instituto Tecnológico Agropecuario de Tabasco
  • Instituto Tecnológico de El Salto
  • Instituto Tecnológico Superior de Zongolica
  • Instituto Tecnológico del Valle de Oaxaca

United States[5][edit]

(alphabetized by state)

  • Reedley College, Reedley, California
  • Abraham Baldwin Agricultural College, Tifton, Georgia
  • University of Maine at Fort Kent, Fort Kent, Maine
  • Allegany College of Maryland, Cumberland, Maryland
  • Itasca Community College, Grand Rapids, Minnesota
  • Vermilion Community College, Ely, Minnesota
  • Thompson School, University of New Hampshire, Durham, New Hampshire
  • Paul Smith's College, Paul Smiths, New York
SUNY-ESF Ranger School, Wanakena, New York
  • SUNY-ESF Ranger School, Wanakena, New York
  • SUNY Morrisville State College (a College of Agriculture and Technology), Morrisville, New York
  • Haywood Community College, Clyde, North Carolina
  • Montgomery Community College, Troy, North Carolina
  • Southeastern Community College, Whiteville, North Carolina
  • Hocking College, Nelsonville, Ohio
  • Eastern Oklahoma State College, Wilburton, Oklahoma
  • Central Oregon Community College, Bend, Oregon
  • Mt. Hood Community College, Gresham, Oregon
  • Penn State Mont Alto, Mont Alto, Pennsylvania
  • Pennsylvania College of Technology, Williamsport, Pennsylvania
  • Horry-Georgetown Technical College, Conway, South Carolina
  • Dabney S. Lancaster Community College, Clifton Forge, Virginia
  • Green River Community College, Auburn, Washington
  • Spokane Community College, Spokane, Washington
  • Glenville State College, Glenville, West Virginia

Asia[edit]

Bangladesh[edit]

  • Bangladesh Forest Academy, Chittagong
  • Forestry Science and Technology Institute, Chittagong
  • Forestry Science and Technology Institute, Rajshahi
  • Forestry Science and Technology Institute, Sylhet

India[edit]

  • Central Academy for State Forest Services, Dehradun
  • Indira Gandhi National Forest Academy, Dehradun
  • Indian Council of Forestry Research and Education, Dehradun

Indonesia[edit]

  • Bakti Rimba Forestry Vocation School, Bogor-West Java

Iran[edit]

  • Kalak Natural Resources Training Center
  • Kelarabad Natural Resources Training Center

Laos[edit]

  • Bolikhamxay Agriculture and Forestry School
  • Champasack Agriculture and Forestry School
  • Dongkhamxang School of Agriculture and Forestry
  • Louang Prabang Agriculture and Forestry School
  • Muang Mai School of Forestry
  • Sepone Agroforestry Training Center

Malaysia[edit]

  • Forestry Training School, Sabah Forestry Institute
  • Furniture Industry Technology Centre (FITEC) under Majlis Amanah Rakyat (MARA)
  • Wood Industry Skills Development Centre (WISDEC) under Malaysian Timber Industry Board (MTIB)

Pakistan[edit]

  • Punjab Forest School, Bahawalpur

Europe[edit]

Czech Republic[edit]

  • Bedrich Schwarzenberg's Forestry College and Secondary Forestry School
  • Vocational School of Forestry in Trutnov

Estonia[edit]

  • Luua Forestry School

Finland[edit]

  • Forestry Study Programme, Häme Polytechnic
  • Forestry and Wood Technology, Pohjois-Savo Polytechnic
  • Unit of Natural Resources, Sodankylä Vocational Institute (SKAI)
  • Swedish Vocational Institute
  • WinNova, Pori

France[edit]

fr:École Supérieure du Bois, (in French) Nantes, France
  • Crogny Forestry College
  • École Supérieure du Bois (in French) (ESB), Nantes
  • Javols Forestry College
  • Meymac Forestry College

Norway[edit]

  • Sønsterud Forestry School

Romania[edit]

  • Forestry Technic College of Campina
  • Secondary Forestry School of Rucar
  • Colegiul Silvic Theodor Pietraru Branesti

Russia[edit]

  • Lisino Forestry College
  • All-Russian Institute of Continuous Education in Forestry (ARICEF)

Switzerland[edit]

  • Centre forestier de formation Lyss (CEFOR-LYSS)

Ukraine[edit]

  • Carpathian Forestry College
  • Lubny Forest Engineering College

United Kingdom[edit]

Merrist Wood College, United Kingdom
  • Herefordshire College of Technology[6]
  • Lincolnshire College of Agriculture
  • Merrist Wood College, Guildford College of Further and Higher Education
  • Pomeroy Forestry School
  • Scotland's Rural College, Barony Campus
  • Scottish School of Forestry, Inverness College
  • Sparsholt College Hampshire

  • List of historic schools of forestry

References[edit]

  1. ^ "Forestry education institutions database". Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations. 11 October 2007. Archived from the original on 2008-06-25. Retrieved 2008-02-01. The database contains the contact information on 356 forestry education institutions from 78 countries [and was] last updated during 2000-2001. 
  2. ^ Lukong Pius Nyuylime, "Cameroon: New Training Programme for Mbalmayo Forestry School," allAfrica.com, November 7, 2006. Accessed: January 16, 2013.
  3. ^ "How Do the Programs Work?" Maritime College of Forest Technology. Accessed: January 20, 2013
  4. ^ "El Proceso de Acreditación de la Carrera Forestal en México" (PDF) (Press release) (in Spanish). Comisión Nacional Forestal. Archived from the original (PDF) on 2010-04-01. Estatus de las Instituciones de Enseñanza Forestal en México en Relación a la Acreditación. 
  5. ^ CEFTS, "Forest Technician Schools" Archived 2011-07-19 at the Wayback Machine.. Retrieved May 15, 2012.
  6. ^ UK Forestry Commission
